intro: This Product User Manual provides comprehensive documentation for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Natura 2000 (N2K) product. It details the Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) data available for grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe, focusing on the 2006, 2012, and 2018 reference years. The manual elucidates the product's characteristics, methodology, and potential applications, with an emphasis on the technical aspects of data production, quality assessment, and user access, aiding in effective monitoring and assessment of habitat conservation status.
